The Friends We Are

ðŸš€ Bulletpitch

A road trip game for two friends to find out how deep their friendship is by dealing with the most adventurous situations.



ðŸ’­ Game Idea

Two friends travel to the west coast with a â€žborrowedâ€œ school bus. On their way they are troubled with the most diverse situations they have to master together.

After every event they get an overview of how well they performed the task. At the end a score shows them how deep their friendship really is.

2 players
